name: Name
if_it_is_on_kid_no_phone: If enabled, any adult in the family will be able to log into the child's account, complete tasks, and receive rewards on his/her behalf. For this, you need to select his/her profile when logging in or press the 'Switch user' button in the menu.
when_kid_gets_phone: When the child gets a phone, you can easily transfer all the child's data to it. Through the 'Family' menu item, click on the child's profile, select 'got a phone' and follow the instructions.
zoom_in_zoom_out: To zoom in/out, move the top or bottom edges
drag_with_one_finger: Drag with one finger to move.
ifYouAreUnderThirteen: If you are under 13 years old
contactYourParents: contact your parents or guardian so that they can review this information.
pleaseReadTerms: Please read and accept our Terms of Use. They introduce the rules and conditions you agree to comply with when using the app. Also, read our Privacy Policy, where we describe what data of yours is collected and processed in the App.
areYouAdultOrChild: Are you an adult or a child?
toProtectYourData: To protect your data, link your account by any of the methods below
guestDataIsNotProtected: Guest account data cannot be protected!
guestFirstTitle: To ensure the security of your data, please link your account as soon as possible by one of the methods we offer on the previous screen.
guestSecondTitle: Access will be retained on the current device, but in case of data loss or moving to a new device, it will be impossible to recover the family and all data. It is possible to create a family without registration for testing the application and later register via
soThatFamilyRecognizesYou: so that family members recognize you
areYouMomOrDad: Are you a mom or a dad?
accountPrefsFirtTitle: If enabled, then for children in the app, you are displayed as 'Dad' or 'Mom'.
accountPrefsSecondTitle: If disabled, then for children in the app, you are displayed under the name you have set.
